name: palaeolithic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the period when humans used tools and weapons made of stone: The Palaeolithic Period is sometimes called the Old Stone Age. Palaeolithic paintings were found in caves at Lascaux. Compare
mesolithic
neolithic specialized
More examplesFewer examplesOur palaeolithic ancestors occupied this area. The carving is among the most beautiful examples of palaeolithic art.Scientific analysis of pollen and carbon-14 remains have confirmed a palaeolithic date.
